price: Hawawi sawa watu wa Motoni na watu wa Peponi. Watu wa Peponi ndio wenye kufuzu.
arabic: لَا يَسۡتَوِيٓ أَصۡحَٰبُ ٱلنَّارِ وَأَصۡحَٰبُ ٱلۡجَنَّةِۚ أَصۡحَٰبُ ٱلۡجَنَّةِ هُمُ ٱلۡفَآئِزُونَ
footnotes: Hawawi sawa watu wa Motoni wanao teswa, na watu wa Peponi wanao neemeshwa. Watu wa Peponi peke yao ndio wenye kufuzu kwa kila walipendalo.

version.title: Swahili translation - Ali Muhsen Alberwany
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Swahili by Ali Muhsen Alberwany

meta.transliteration: lā yastawī aṣḥābu al-nāri wa-aṣḥābu al-janati aṣḥābu al-janati humu al-fāizūna
